meanings.sent1: There were a jillion stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: She had a jillion toys scattered across the room.
meanings.sent3: I asked for a jillion dollars, but all I got was a penny.
meanings.sent4: The field was covered with a jillion colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was overflowing with a jillion gold coins.

meanings.definition: A very large amount or quantity.
meanings.sent1: He had a jillion reasons to be happy.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sold a jillion cookies during the holiday season.
meanings.sent3: I found a jillion socks in the laundry, but none of them matched.
meanings.sent4: The library had a jillion books on various topics.
meanings.sent5: The factory produced a jillion paper clips in a day.
